點睇

If, like me, you're late to playing this game - don't unless you're an (sub)average gamer. Some lazy/bad game design elements which stopped me from giving the game much more of a chance - just play one of many other unplayed games.

Healing - want to heal in combat? Of course you can. Want to heal out of combat? Nope. Any reason? Nope. Other than to set up a separate feature unnecessarily. They already have a "charge" system in the game that they simply could have applied to out of combat situations.

Buying provisions before each adventure. Your gear is permanent, but for some reason they want everything else to expire after each adventure. Any reason given? Nope. They could have justified food going bad and maybe potions and such expiring, but other items such as skeleton keys and shovels... just gone every time. Stupid and lazy.

Finding these flaws easily and early just means there are other problems waiting to be encountered. Pass. I'll stick with games of actual strategy.

買3合1版，同價錢有齊dlc加前2代

以爽度來講Arkham knight一流，但因為自由度大覆上升，所以用腦程度比之前2隻少咗好多。內容好厚，主線10粒鐘，支線20粒鐘，有new game plus，挑戰模式差唔多無可能玩晒。

之前2隻都好正，asylum得一條主線過，但偵探元素係最有質素。打鬥、潛入能力有限，反而好考反應同創意。

City開始有支線，主線支線各特色，每款內容都唔止青蜒點水，但又點到即止。今時今日我都會評做10分作品。但前2代件suit真係比較宗於原註，有啲難頂。

replies.msg:
真
但偏偏呢類mobile game從商業角度黎講就係最好嘅賺錢方程式
以前仲以為YouTube廣告果堆掛羊頭賣狗肉嘅劣質驚邊有人玩
後尾先知原來賺勁撚多錢
當用極低成本寫隻垃圾出黎靠呃都搵到錢嘅時候
以後呢種低投入高回報嘅模式只會越黎越泛濫

而且另外一點好重要嘅就係往往呢類手機驚都食正人性個弱點 就係攀比心
只要忍唔住課過一次就會洗濕個頭繼續淪陷落去
可能年代唔同咗
真係會花時間去享受同細味一隻用心製作出黎嘅遊戲嘅人已經變得好少
其實真係好可悲
